item.description:
At the BBTC Scholarship Benefit Auction Marie was the winning bidder for this coming Labor Day weekend at the Custom House in Boston. She thought it would be fun to use this opportunity for a club event at this great down town location.

Come join Marie and Gordon for a couple drinks in the condo, tour the Custom House and go out to dinner. We're looking for something with live music.

Schedule for Saturday,  Sept 1:

Wine & Cheese in the condo - 5:00 PM (both red & white available)

Tour the Custom House - 6:00 PM

Dinner - 7:30 or 8:00 PM at the Black Rose

Live Music - 9:00 PM

 

RSVP to receive more details as they develop.
item.how_to_find_us: I will provide more detail to those that RSVP
item.name: Night on the Town
